basic.description: The basic mechanisms of mass transport and phase transformations in materials are developed from thermodynamic and kinetic principles.  Topics include phase equilibria, diffusion, solidification and solid-state transformations.  The application of these phenomena to materials processing methods, such as casting, forming, heat treatment and sintering is described.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Prin Of Materials Processing

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of MECH270 or MECH271 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
